items.description: To confront China, the president must rediscover the clarity and conviction of his first term — and leave behind the weakness and confusion that are d...

items.title: Trump Should Not Go Soft on Pot
items.description: Reclassifying marijuana under federal rules would be a mistake — and isn’t necessary for further medical research.

items.title: Disclosure Laws Put Targets on the Backs of Nonprofit Donors
items.description: In an age of doxxing, violent threats, and professional retribution for people’s policy positions, exposing donors creates real risks.

items.title: Where’s the Critical Coverage of Left-Wing Conspiracy Theorists?
items.description: The online hysteria over Trump’s health should have been roundly condemned, not treated as a quirky viral cultural event.

items.title: Age-Old Bible Tales in a New Light
items.description: Past Watchful Dragons uses fantasy and fairy tales to make the familiar stories fresh again.
